author: Source: Weyburn This Week
title: Lightspeed says it has solution for struggling retailers in digital age - Weyburn This Week
text:
A Montreal tech company with big ambitions for global growth says it has an inexpensive solution for restaurateurs and other retailers looking to thrive in the digital age. Lightspeed says its cloud-based software system can assist mid-sized retailers and restaurants manage inventory, take orders, process payments, analyze customer shopping patterns and develop an e-commerce presence.
 Weyburn This Week.
